features: New Material Rugs: Our modern minimalist pure cotton rug has the characteristics of ultra soft, skin friendly, and short hair that does not fall off. Kids and pets can use it with peace of mind. You can choose this rug without any worries

Premium Memory Sponge: Our modern indoor carpets adopt a thickened memory sponge pad in the middle layer, which can bring you a cozy home experience and protect the floor and provide some sound insulation

Anti-Slip Bottom Design: Our pure cotton carpet is composed of a non-woven lining and a dense cloth of anti slip latex particles at the bottom, greatly enhancing the friction and adhesion between the carpet and the ground

Perfect Home Decor: The minimalist style of indoor rug is perfect for any style of home decoration. And we offer a three sizes. You can lay this beautiful rug in living room, bedroom, nursery, dormitory, office or other rooms you want

Warm Tips for Rugs: How to get a nice and fluffy rug when you first opened the vacuum package? Please keep patient and just put it into a capacity washer/drier with low setting. After washing and drying, the carpet will quickly return to its original state, and wrinkles and odors will disappear
body.description: Larhom Luxury Comfortable cotton wool Modern Indoor Area Rug Parameters： Material：Comfortable cotton wool 100% Weave Type：Machine Made Construction Type：3-layer design, soft wool coral fleece surface, Thickened Memory-Foam, Non-slip Bottom Style： Modern Carpet, Minimalist Carpet Special Feature: Fluffy, Thickened, Skin Friendly, Non Slip, Washable Room Type：living room rug, bedroom rug, bedside rug, nursery rug, classroom rug, kids room rug, playroom rug, dining room rug, office rug How to get a nice and fluffy rug when you first opened the vacuum package? Please keep patient and just put it into a washer/drier with low setting. After washing and drying, the carpet will quickly return to its original state, wrinkles and odors will disappear Size selection suggestions： 3 x 5 ft area rug is suitable for your bedside, nursery or children's room 4 x 6 ft area rug is suitable for your playroom, or beside sofa and chair 5 x 7 area rug is suitable for your living room, bedroom or large dining room Warm ips for the rug: 1. Considering of the transport and dust protection requirements of the rug, we use vacuum packing 2. The rug pack with a vacuum bag, the thickness will recover within two days, please don't worry 3. If you find some smell of the product when receiving it, it's a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage, just please expose it to the air for some time 4. Please wash the carpets according to the instructions of the washing 5. Due to the different lighting effects of the monitor and camera, the image may be slightly different from the actual color of the product 6. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This rug really ties the music room together
reviews.reviewText: I have a dedicated music room in my home where all my instruments and equipment are set up. The color scheme in there is mostly monochrome. I bought a plain black rug to go under my drum set, but I got the measurements wrong and ended up with a rug that was far too big for the room. I finally got around to replacing it - and this smaller rug is just right for the job.It ships in a vacuum-sealed bag, which is handy for shipping purposes, but the rug had a slight chemical odor when I removed it from the bag. I aired it out for a couple of days, then washed it and air-dried it; that got rid of the smell and allowed the rug to fluff out properly. It is not a deep-pile rug, but it has a slight shag, which gives it a bit more interest than a regular flat rug. And having a rug under my kit doesn’t improve my drumming, but it makes the room look more like a real band space and less like a library.I have the same rug in different colors in other parts of the house and I have no complaints about any of them. They are soft underfoot, add some nice color to the beige tiles, and help to define the different parts of the home. They are machine washable and don’t take too long to air dry, so care and maintenance is easy to manage. All in all, this is a good value accessory for any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Rug, It Is Like A Giant Blanket
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug, it is like a giant blanket packaged into a floor rug. It feels like a cross between a fleece blanket and an incredibly soft and luxurious towel. It has a short fiber, as you can see in the photos but it is incredibly soft. While I was taking a few photos of this rug you can see one of my dogs came over and took up residence on it. It is light weight so is easy to move around the house, it has a rubber foam backing on it that helps it stay where you place it and not go for a walk across the wood floors.This rug is light weight, in fact my dog that you see in the photos, decided he wanted it and proceeded to pick it up and drag it to another room where it is now. I had planned to have this rug by my bed but my dog has decided that will not be the case. This rug is quick and easy to vacuum, and any strains on it come out easily with some dishwashing liquid on a damp paper towel. I would not risk washing this in the washing machine as it might come out a little bit matted, it is easy enough to clean by hand. I am loving this incredibly soft rug and my dog loves it too, I may have to order another one for me as originally planned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Rug but HORRIBLE Smell!
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality rug for the price but the toxic smell is disgusting! Must be aired out and spray with Febreze Fabric spray just to tolerate the smell. Hopefully in time it goes away, and this rug is for a bedroom and no way will anyone sleep well with that smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Rug, Looks Great and Soft On the Feet. Perfect Choice!
reviews.reviewText: This Larhom Large Modern Area Rug is exactly what I was searching for to complete my living room space—it fits in flawlessly! The new material and design are simply fantastic.The pure cotton material feels ultra-soft and incredibly skin-friendly, and the short nap ensures it's pet-friendly too, which is a huge relief. I love that my furry friends can enjoy it as much as I do. But what truly sets it apart is the premium memory sponge in the middle layer—talk about cozy! It not only gives a comforting feel but also protects my floors while providing some sound insulation, a blessing in my bustling NYC apartment.The anti-slip bottom design and the non-woven lining and latex particle composition ensure it stays in place, no matter how much foot traffic it endures. Plus, the versatility of this rug is amazing. Its minimalist style complements my home decor, and it works well not just in the living room but also in the bedroom and office, adding a touch of elegance to every room.This rug has truly elevated the ambiance of my living space—it's cozy, stylish, and practical all at once. If you're on the hunt for a modern, versatile, and high-quality area rug, this rug gem is a perfect choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Like a bath towel
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my drum set. They slide all over this rug like they’re on ice and it feels like I’m setting my drums up on a towel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its so fluffy
reviews.reviewText: oh wow. and black. and fluffy. and its a nice rug. great for next to the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Leightweight
reviews.reviewText: No doubt about it, this is a lightweight rug. It looks great and feels great to walk on. It is thin, kind of like a lightweight blanket, but with a textured bottom. My dog immediately claimed it as his new place to sleep, nap, or hang out. It attracted dog hair rather easily and needed to be cleaned the second day I had it. I was unable to vacuum it because my vacuum kept lifting it up. I opted to just throw it in the washing machine. It survived the cleaning and looks as good as new. This is a surprisingly rugged little rug. There is not a lot of padding, but it looks nice. All stitching seems to be quality and the color is pleasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Rug is So Soft and Cuddly
reviews.reviewText: I really just want to run my fingers through this rug. It is so super soft. It is well made and lays flat. I like that it is washable. I washed it once so far, and it does wash well and comes out nicely. However, it will fill your washer (or at least it filled mine). I air dried it on the wash line. I don’t think I would use it in a high traffic area, but I would recommend it. Five stars.
